## Loading and preprocessing the data

```{r}
library (data.table)

# file download
url <- "https://github.com/kdconway/RepData_PeerAssessment1/raw/master/activity.zip"
if (!file.exists ("./data")) {
    dir.create ("./data")
    download.file (url, "./data/activity.zip")
    unzip ("./data/activity.zip", exdir = "./data")
}     

#read in activity data to act dataframe
act <- read.csv ("./data/activity.csv")


#transform date to Posix.lt format
act$date <- transform (act, date=as.POSIXlt((date)))

```
